description: This source file defines a React functional component 'Dashboard' for rendering a notes exploration page. It manages state for notes, loading status, handles search and category filters, and fetches data from a Supabase backend, implementing server-side and client-side filtering.

methods.name: Dashboard({ session, onUpload, refreshKey })
methods.description: React functional component rendering the dashboard page with notes, filters, and search functionality.

ctags.pattern: /^export default function Dashboard({ session, onUpload, refreshKey }) {$/
